summary: This module supplies image transformation utilities and dataset helpers designed for Vision Transformer (ViT) training in the Megatron framework. It offers preprocessing pipelines for classification and self‑supervised tasks, advanced augmentations like Gaussian blur, solarization, and inpainting, a deterministic random‑seed provider, and functions to construct training and validation datasets.
business_intent: Enable scalable, reproducible, and high‑quality data preparation for large‑scale vision model training and deployment, reducing engineering effort and improving model performance.
